body: i'm thankful that after i (basically) finished packing and sat down in a chair in our living room to buy my last minute airport shuttle ticket, i dmed e to compliment her usage of an instagram pusheen sticker, and in response, she sent me a panoramic scroll from a darkened bar in new orleans where my favorite people expressed excitement about seeing me. i'm thankful that i'll get to be around her and all of them starting tomorrow.
